website_summaries.verdict: The price tag is a bit high for the lack of comfort and support, but the color choices are nice.
pros: Unlike most futon mattresses, this one comes in a wide variety of colors
It's easy to find a hue that matches any existing decor
cons: doesn't offer much in the way of comfort or support, especially for sleeping

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It came to my with many stains, I can’t accept this mattress, look at it what’s inside?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived with a minor tear
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a complete frame and bed, i felt a bit cheated that it was only a mattress, I could have gottEN JUST A MATTRESS FOR UNDER $90. Please read the entire add when you do a search... I was expecting the frame and mattress... but I needed it so I kept it. I could have gotten the whole set same quality at walmart for $130.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: 6 inch is actually 4 inch.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted 8 inch but for some reason Amazon would ship me a 6 inch but not 8 inch. I figured 2 inch not gonna make that much a difference. That 6 inch mattress measures an actual 4 inch, and very uncomfortable, can feel the wood slats, and the mattress wants to squeeze between them. Also it has a strong chemical smell that has to air out. I had to have something on the frame so will keep it but had to put a mattress topper from Costco on top of it just to make it feel semi decent. I would not recommend this futon mattress to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ahnko Chee

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: -Packaging and shipping were great. The rest not so much. -The mattress I ordered was more orange than the picture, which was disappointing as I was looking to get way from the orange. -It had multiple stains on it when I pulled it out of the package. -Not sure if you like sleeping on rocks but I don’t and this mattress is comparable to just that. -The stitch and button holes don’t look to be very sturdy and makes me wonder how much use I will actually get out of it. I would not recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mattress after ordering only 3 days ago. It is much better than I expected for the price. It seems very thick and feels like it will hold up for a long time. I will be using as a sofa cushion, and it feels really comfortable when sitting. Took no time to plump up to 6".
customer_reviews.author: S. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't look like product photo at all, looks sloppy on my futon frame. It doesn't have anything to attach it to the frame. My mattress had stains and also huge white stitches that I didn't see on the product photos (see my photos attached). Not sure what to do with it now, since it was very heavy to unpack and place. Color is a very nice bright red though, different from product picture, but somebody else had the real photo in the reviews, so I expected it.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Wish I listened to all the negative reviews and canceled my order. Mine does have tiny rips at all the stitches that are supposed to make this mattress tufted, just like the pictures others posted. The mattress came with a smell, is hard as a rock, and does not easily fold into the couch shape! It also falls right off my futon frame. I’m honestly about to try double sided tape. HUGE disappointment for the cost of this mattress
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Printz

customer_reviews.title: This futon mattress it’s not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This futon mattress is crap my picture that I put up looks nothing like this is supposed to be it is uncomfortable it doesn’t feel like it has anything in it at all I want at least half my money back for this and not have to return it otherwise I’d take a full refund and return it but because my son is to the point where he has something to sleep on so he doesn’t care He’s a teenager he’ll pretty much sleep on anything but this mattress is crap and I want at least half my money back and not have to go through the hassle of returning it. This mattress is not worth $114 it’s crap😡
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Better then expectation.
customer_reviews.text: When the product arrived at my house, I was worried about the futon mattress since the top of the box was open. However, upon opening and carefully examining the mattress I was very satisfied with my purchase. The only other thing that I could mention is that the mattress is smaller than the picture on amazon. Nevertheless, the futon mattress is comfortable and exactly what I was looking for in regards to a futon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: VERY cheap STINKY mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst futon mattress that I have purchased out of four since 1994 and the only one through Amazon. It is about 4 inches thick, so you feel the slats through it, product says 6 inches, it's very thin. And the smell! It's like weeds or hemp or something, WTH? This, is NOT a good product. My last futon five years ago was less expensive and from Walmart, I should've went back there, because this is hard to return but exceeded my expectations for cheap junk, SAD!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want it to look nice.
customer_reviews.text: Product comes pre torn. Cover is so thin it's ripped at all the tie spots
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Lei

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase smells of pesticides
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing! I ordered a 6 inch which is truly maybe barely 4 inches. I can feel the wood slats of the futon frame through this mess of filler. It has a pesticide smell that has not dissipated in the four days that it’s been airing. How can I return this monstrosity? It is size full but it’s very heavy. Furthermore, it does not stay in place as a folded couch. It doesn’t bend and slides off the frame. What a disappointment! I was not paid for this comment.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel O

customer_reviews.title: No damn frame
customer_reviews.text: This product is pictured with a frame. No frame comes with it. There is a lead to another frame which also has an overhead single bunk. Frankly this borders on fraud. I wanted a couch that turns into a bed. What I have is a mattress on the floor. I feel misled and cheated. I would gladly pay extra for the frame pictured, but I do not want to spend another $350 for a frame with a bunk that I do not want.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Morris

customer_reviews.title: Purchase with caution and lowered expectations.
customer_reviews.text: First of all the color of the mattress i received could never be described as "dusty blue" its more teal/green than blue. Second the tag was cut off?? Also one of the tuffting ties was undone. And it has a weird chemical smell??? Its yet to be seen how comfortable it is. At this juncture I'm stuck with it regardless as I don't think i can put this Jeanie back in the bottle if you know what I mean. My suggestion is to purchase with caution and lowered expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Muinn

customer_reviews.title: Question rather than Review
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused...does this expand in 24 hours like some mattresses do? I just opened it - it’s barely 4”? I will wait 24 hours to see, but if it doesn’t expand to 6” I’m returning it! Giving it 1 star for now - will change if expands.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, no bulk at all.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I didn't notice it didn't come with a frame, that is on me, but I still thought it could be nice. I don't believe there is any memory foam in it at all, it is too flimsy and flexible. And basically rock hard if you sit on it. You can feel the wood slats underneath. My old mattress was over 25 years old, and still more sturdy than this. I am disappointed, but it's also my fault, I forgot to read the reviews before I bought. Pretty color, but I'm going to cover it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Many people claimed that there was a strong smell from the dye. I was a little worried as I purchased this for my mother who has asthma. There was absolutely no smell to the fabric. The mattress fits well and is very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: The perfect blue to match Gators gear!
customer_reviews.text: Received the futon mattress even before the promised delivery date. It was packed in plastic inside a cardboard box and rolled up. Upon unpacking it, it was clean and obviously new with no flaws whatsoever. The bright blue color matches our Florida Gators theme perfectly and really completes the room. And to top it off, surprisingly... this mattress is softer and more comfortable than the original one that came with the futon! I'm very satisfied and especially love the fact that I was given the option for paying in installments with Amazon! What could be better!?
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D. Rennick

customer_reviews.title: Regretting my choice. Horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Only 5 inches thick-allowing it 24 hours to sit to see if it gets thicker. The mattress has a horrible smell-smells like chemicals and wood chips. I have the window open to air out the room. Honestly wondering how I’m supposed to be able to wash the cover since all this loose stuff floating around on the inside. Comfort wise it’s nothing special. And I think the big lots one for $99 would have been the better choice but I liked the color of this one. Now I’m regretting it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Working from home I needed to modify my guest room/office space. I had a very large futon some years ago. I bought a KD frame and had my favorite TaskRabbit guy put it together for me, and I bought this mattress. I tend to like a really firm bed with just a bit of soft cushioning on the mattress. This worked well. I am also 5'1" tall and getting it up my stairs was manageable. If you like a pretty firm mattress, this should work well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Bad odor
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a year now still has chemical odor
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Pengra

customer_reviews.title: Quality is inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered two of these about a week or so apart. The first one that came is great. It's still holding up fine after using it daily. However, the second one is of a different quality. First off it's not the same blue and it doesn't seem stuffed as much. And it has completely bottomed out. I think this is odd as I ordered only weeks apart from the same place.
customer_reviews.author: Yeroc

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, read through the whole description
customer_reviews.text: In my haste I didn't screen the product to make sure it was what I thought it would be. To my disappointment it was only a mattress and not the whole futon as the pictures show. For the price I didn't think I was only getting a mattress. I could have gone on Walmart.com and got a COMPLETE mattress for the price I paid for a sole mattress smh was very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Richard&Shanee Clark

customer_reviews.title: lies and garbage
customer_reviews.text: 3 inches thick, not 6 inches. smaller than the length width measurements, too. it stinks to high heaven. they sent the wrong color. I am not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Color off but good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice! It’s thick, pretty comfortable, and seems to be made with durable materials. Only problem I have is that it’s most certainly NOT “dusty blue” lol! It’s way brighter than expected, we’re hoping it’ll fade over time. Other than that, it is exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Such a great addition to my studio!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this solid wood made in USA futon- has 3 positions and easy to use. Shipping was fast and came well packaged, easy instructions too. (I am an older petite woman so I had help assembling it, but not really difficult). Very glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This is just the futon and is poor quality. If you want to return it wont fit back in the box so you will have to find one or pay the ups store 80 bucks for a new box because they only cover shipping on return and not packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids or smaller adults not ideal for a fat ass like me but my 11 year old brother loves it
customer_reviews.author: Debbra phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: For the price this futon mattress is really thick and a great value for the money I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming Smell but Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My inlaws are the only ones who have used it so far and said its actually pretty comfy. Its fairly firm but not ridiculous. Only complaint was smell but it was fresh out of the package. My complaint is that its been open for 2.5 weeks ish and it still smells. The smell was outrageously over powering and still was up untill about 3 days ago maybe. Its is tolerable now but ONLY if I have the fan on the highest level and the bathroom fan on.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress for the money and I like the thickness and cover. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable futon mattress
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and comfort of mattress. There was no offensive odor to mattress when opened. I did let the mattress sit near an open window,prior to usage.
customer_reviews.author: Merrifacts

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion for a large swing replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for my 2005 porch swing. I kept recovering the cushion every year because it was so comfortable to sit on. But this year it had to be buried. This futon mattress fits perfectly snug on my swing. The best part is I can interchange full sheets on it to keep it clean from dust and bird droppings. My swing is a very durable metal swing that has beautiful patina from all the changing seasons throughout the years.
customer_reviews.author: P Wheatley

customer_reviews.title: Appears very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Appears well made. It’s solid for two big people. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Bart Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Its ok...I thought it was a lil small in size...not as sturdy as I wished and fabric really wrinkly.
customer_reviews.author: Chelarrie Goldsby

customer_reviews.title: Little pricey for the quality of it.
customer_reviews.text: Using it mainly as an everyday couch. I like it, it's comfortable, flexible. I also think that it is a little pricey for the quality of it. One of the cheaper ones I could find. Unfortunately, The stiching holding it together isn't of very great quality. Also, there are LOTS of long pieces of string from the stiching, hanging off of the mattress all the way around it. I had to trim them off & I'm hoping the stiching doesn't come apart....
customer_reviews.author: Luna Nadda

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortanle futon
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Well packaged and delivered sooner then I was originally told to expect. Matress was wrapped up tight with plastic and once we got the plastic off, mattress flilled right out! Kids and I find our futon mattess very comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: L. Speenburgh

customer_reviews.title: Futon
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful blue futon. When I get the frame will be able to convert a couch into a bed in my small space apartment. Fast shipping great product thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hayselden

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This futon is very poorly made. I ordered grey, received blue. The stitching is terrible. The cushion is sewn uneven. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: azure

customer_reviews.title: No designed for regular use
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, its ok for a teenager to sit on but his friends who have slept on it a agree its very uncomfortable. Lost some of its firmness in a couple months
customer_reviews.author: melissa white

customer_reviews.title: pretty good but stinks
customer_reviews.text: does not fluff up very much but is pretty comfortable. biggest issue I have with this is it smells extremely and strongly weird. Like a musty storage bin.
customer_reviews.author: *e*C*

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One for each of my children's bunk bed futon and couldnt be more pleased. They say they're even more comfortable than the original mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: slendy

customer_reviews.title: Tiny home bed
customer_reviews.text: I have lived on futons for years. Now that we have a loft in a cabin (tiny home living) I got this for its size primarily. Rolled it out and it seemed a bit flat but got bigger as time went on. Very comfortable for a futon. Would recommend for tinyhome living spaces very much. But get a mattress protector and sheets, wouldn’t recommend the direct contact with the fabric as it will not last you as long
customer_reviews.author: Irene Katzias

customer_reviews.title: Read item description b4 buying
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm just a bit upset that I failed to fully read the item description, buuuut my dogs love it and I ordered a frame off of wayfair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Merrifield

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son since his twin bed is now too small. Once you remove the plastic cover and binding, make sure you give it at least a day or two to air itself out, and to expand. I had to open my son's window to get rid of the packaging scent. After that, all was good.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Purnell

customer_reviews.title: WOW. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I expected.i couldn't resist laying on it as soon as I opened it and it inflated. It's from but soft at the same time. It is even better a few days later after it hd a chance to fully inflate.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: TOO THIN
customer_reviews.text: So thin you can feel wood slats. Waste of money. Mow I have to buy another so I can actually sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gulbranson

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten a much more comfortable sleep with this mattress. I've had it for about two weeks now. It's perfect for my full size futon. It's not wrinkling up.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, love color, good value
customer_reviews.text: been looking for a new futon mattress, love the cinnamon color, pretty comfortable. Good value for the money. Securely boxed and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria pasquali

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: Like sitting (laying) on a rock. Why would a futon with memory foam be that hard??? Not going to fit back in the box so we wasted this $118 Dollars. I've had a cotton futon before and it was firm but this is rock hard!!! .
customer_reviews.author: cheryl nehring muller

customer_reviews.title: Smells better than my old one
customer_reviews.text: It's got a weird artificial smell, but it's better than dog pee. Jury is out on durability, and it's pretty thin so after a couple hours sitting on it your butt might hurt. But hell, it was less than $100 so what do you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: It dose not stay fluffy it flattened to quickly hangs over to much and slides down
customer_reviews.author: frances delatorre

customer_reviews.title: I would like a refund.
customer_reviews.text: This was a substitute mattress. When I unpacked and opened the mattress It had a strong nauseating overwhelming odor. I aired it outside for 2 days. I am very displeased. The odor still remains. It smells the whole room. Like a horse stable Due to the way it was packed in a roll, I did not return. Maybe I can get a refund and dump it in garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Product worked out perfect, however it had a slight odor when it arrived that went away after about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Foley

customer_reviews.title: Fold it
customer_reviews.text: Was not quite the full thickness But, it doubles as a bed
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: No frame
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with frame, just the cushion. The cushion is way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable futon.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a bunk bed with a futon couch underneath. Some reviews mention a smell,but that is true with most mattresses today that come rolled up. It went away after 2 days. My kids love it. It's more comfortable than other futons I've sat on and it's perfect for kids to sleep on. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This futon cover arrived very quickly, and was easy to unwrap and place on the futon frame. It is extremely thick but malleable to fit onto the futon frame and keeps its shape even after multiple uses. It is very comfortable to lay on and folds nicely when the futon is placed upright.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Holtgraver

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These mattresses always seem to come with dark “stains”. However, after some research online, spot treating with some laundry detergent is able to remove the stains. Also have a cover on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: pretty awesome deal if you can get it while its on sale. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hazy

customer_reviews.title: COmfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Packaged great, came as expected and happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: abunch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice but it was deceiving in the fact that my college student thought that it came with the frame. It is only the mattress. he loves it and is just using it without the frame. He's a freshman. He doesn't care!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee Berger

customer_reviews.title: Fake picture false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the product because assuming that I was getting what was advertised or would look to be advertised and to get a regular futon mattress with very deep sleeping it doesn't have the cleats and it's not as thick as the mozaic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered and arrived on time - even a little early. For the price, this is a great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shea

customer_reviews.title: Delivered days before set date
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing addition to my sleeping comfort... Product was delivered 5 days before scheduled date.. No smell, (as others have commented)... Packaging was to standard for a item this size.. All in all...I am very happy with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s not 6 inches thick!! Maybe 3 if you’re lucky!
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Gladly appreciate this;)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered..right size but lil off but still useful. My son sleeps great..Thanks2020 for yall services.
customer_reviews.author: Roshell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish Futon Mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is very comfortable. I love sitting/ laying down on it. The only reason for four stars is because there are many threads around the seam/ zipper that hang off that I needed to trim and the tag is very difficult to rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Fravel

customer_reviews.title: no bad for price
customer_reviews.text: You can't feel the springs through it, so its pretty good for price...Fits well on the futon i have, i had to hookup ties to the loops to keep it from sliding down on the futon though
customer_reviews.author: Zombie Lover

customer_reviews.title: previous mattress lasted 6 yrs, this one — less than 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and poorly made. It basically went flat in a month. After I bought a replacement, I tried to remove the cover to put on the new mattress (I like the color on this one better) — and couldn't. Inside is just loose stuffing and it was immediately apparent how poorly made this is. Pillows are better made than this
customer_reviews.author: unspoken voices

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product !!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is not at all what I expected. There is no memory foam or any foam in this mattress. It is some shredded product that bunches up and is very uncomfortable. I would return this product but it is so bulky I have no idea how to do that !
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Stains and Cover cannot be removed and Cleaned
customer_reviews.text: Good futon but arrived with stains on it and no way to get this cleaned or resolved with Amazon. I do not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Not a 6" futon!
customer_reviews.text: I have slept on futons for over 30 years. I ordered this, properly unpackaged and give it plenty of time to fluff up, which it did. However, after only a month, the futon has flattened to less than 4 inches! Highly recommend you DO NOT purchase this futon.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Color isn't as picture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this futon mattress for my new frame. Color doesn't look like the advertised picture at all. It's like old light gray and I ended up putting on a mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Han H.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell and tear
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is very comfy! The only thing I would have to complain about is the strong chemical smell it has on the fabric and that it came with a tear on the side of it. The year is a fixable problem. Other than that, I’m pretty happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pau chaves

customer_reviews.title: The price to high
customer_reviews.text: When I made the order I thought I was getting the mattress and the metal I got a mattress it’s too thin I don’t look like it’s $138 worth it don’t even fit on a regular size futon I don’t know what’s the problem but that mattress is really really thin
customer_reviews.author: pamella griffin

customer_reviews.title: This mattress was ok at best
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was OK it wasn’t very comfortable but it did ship very quickly but I should’ve ordered a thicker one gives me some back pain
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected
customer_reviews.text: Thinner and poorer quality than I expected. It needs a cover on top of the cover it comes with. It’s rough and shows white threads through a Burgundy cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Malodorous
customer_reviews.text: Quite heavy and has a bad smell. I can feel my throat closing.
customer_reviews.author: AmSans

customer_reviews.title: Wording is a little bit misleading
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression the futon came with the mattress
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the ivory color material is so thin you can see the batting through it. Seams are ripping and I have had it less than a month and it is falling apart. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good price and well made. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item. Well made and sturdy. It is firm however.
customer_reviews.author: cella

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted
customer_reviews.text: Box came damaged. Bed looked like it had been used and returned before.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable straight out of the package with a few hours to gain shape. No more aches and pains from poor prior sleeping situation. Best nights sleep in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sanderlin

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Just came today! So comfortable and soft! Has a smell of like sweaty feet or sour pickles though... could be the packaging lol Very comfy though! I just placed it on my floor, no frame! So cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccah Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: JUST a mattress
customer_reviews.text: Every photo on the product shows a matress on the frame, but this product was literally just the mattress without a frame, which costs another $80. Better to go find a whole set in person than deal with misleading sellers like this.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is comfy comfy! We literally put it on top of the bed for a few nights as a mattress topper. The color is great and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mac

customer_reviews.title: Decent futon
customer_reviews.text: I like this futon but the screws were too big for the holes so I had to make EACH hole bigger which wasn’t the easiest
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Badly made
customer_reviews.text: Bad smell and inside stuffing was dirty and looked like dirty sheared sheep wool
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s look great
customer_reviews.text: It does smell a bit like kinda old woody paint. I just need to put it in the sun to air out for a couple days. Beside that the shipping was fast and product as pictures showed.
customer_reviews.author: PHU PHAM

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY - UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: IF THIS WASN'T SO HEAVY I WOULD RETURN IT TO GET MY MONEY BACK. VERY UNCOMFORTABLE AFTER A WEEK IM HAVING BACK PAIN I JUST WANT TO CRY. IM NOT A HAPPY CUSTOMER AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress-excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to order this because a few people said it had a strong smell. I noticed this too but I put it out on my covered porch for several days and the smell went away-its a dye smell. I have had several people, some with back problems, sleep on it and all of them said it was very comfortable-good price too.
customer_reviews.author: anon361

customer_reviews.title: does not include frame!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was just the mattress with no frame with it...try putting frame not included next time. Now I have to spend another 100 and something dollars on a frame
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So comfortable. A lil heavy but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and color, very comfy. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: GeekFamily

customer_reviews.title: Eww
customer_reviews.text: This has a really strong odor I’m thinking about returning it. It’s a lot of money for something that stinks up the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: julie wagi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price this first time owning a futon so I won’t complain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lousy product for price no comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Don't care fir the white stitches. And the mattress if you would call it that is lumpy
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Only A Mattress, No Frame!!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt Clearly State that it's only the mattress unless you look into the description. Advertising is shady.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: For the money, better than we can get locally for twice the price. With Prime account, free shipping, a real bargain. And made in Texas, which used to be part of the US.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Lindh

product_meta.title: Mozaic Full Size 6-inch Cotton Twill Futon Mattress, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Item in image is our Ivory color option View larger Color options MOZAIC FULL SIZE 6-INCH FUTON/ PLATFORM MATTRESS, BLACK
This cotton futon mattress comes in many colors, so you can choose the color that suits your home. The foam mattress is soft, making it a great resting place for guests in your home. The fabric is lace tufted onto the mattress, which gives the futon a 'sofa-like' appearance. The comfortable design can easily fold for sofa or bed positions. Frame not included.

CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS
The futon mattress is constructed of foam wrapped in a mix cotton blend. It is then incased with a durable poly-cotton blend cover. It is lace tufted through for a clean finished look.

VERSATILITY
This is a suitable mattress for futon frames and platform bed frames. The frame is not included. You'll sleep easy each night on this comfy platform futon mattress. Ideal for small apartments and dorm rooms.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS
It ships in a vacuum packed bagging inside a box. Please allow several days for the mattress to return to its full loft and for the wrinkles in the cotton cover to smooth out. Dust with a soft dry cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners. Do not leave spills unattended. Protect from heat and liquids. Keep out of direct sunlight to prevent fading. Spot clean with water.

DETAILS AND DIMENSIONS:
 * Color options: Ivory, khaki, black, navy, red, blue, hunter green, and burgundy 
 * 75-inch by 54-inch by 6-inch thick
 * Cotton wrapped foam
 * Reversible for extended wear
 * Lace-tufting for a sofa like appearance
 * Materials: Poly-Cotton fabric, convoluted foam, cotton blended fiber
 * Upholstery: Poly-cotton Blend
 * Fill materials: Cotton blended fiber, foam
 * Care Instructions: Spot clean with cold water
 * Constructed with different combinations of cotton blended fiber and foam
 * Can be used on a full size futon frame or a platform bed (not included)
 * Frame not included
 * Cover is not removable
feature_bullets: Memory Foam – mattress is made from high quality, dual sided memory foam made from polyester
Standard Full Size Mattress – 75"x54"x6" thick, fits any standard Full size futon frame, sold separately
Cotton Twill Tufted Cover – mattress is covered in cotton twill
Durable and Comfortable – mattress is reversible and made to be used in a futon folded in upright sofa position or flat in a bed position
Futon Mattress Only, Frame is not included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars699 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
